text:
Defamation Order 2012

I make the following order under section 35 of the Defamation Act 2005 .

18 June 2012

BRIAN WIGHTMAN

Minister for Justice

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Defamation Order 2012 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 July 2012.

3. Interpretation
    In this Order â€“
        Act means the Defamation Act 2005 ;
        maximum damages amount has the same meaning as in section 35(1) of the Act.

4. Maximum damages amount
    For the purposes of section 35(1) of the Act, the maximum damages amount that is to apply from 1 July 2012 is declared to be $339 000.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 June 2012

This order is administered in the Department of Justice.
